ground_truth: He sees the cloth with the twine wrapped around it. He picks up the cloth, revealing the triggered bomb mechanism beneath. The claymore ignites the Tall Boy Missile, which erupts into a mushroom cloud of smoke and flame. The blast tears through trees and shrubs and spreads out like a concentric wave of destruction from its epicenter, throwing up dirt and leaves and knocking over soldiers. Sarah and School Boy watch. From the river, the tall boat captain notes the grey smoke from the explosion on land and signals with his hand. The boat moves off. Sarah and School Boy keep running. The patrol boat zips along the river. Sarah and School Boy run down a leafy path. He motions her to stop. They crouch. He rests his rifle on a tree and uses the site as a telescope. She looks. The escapees are being kicked and beaten by soldiers. School Boy lifts his rifle off the tree and searches the area using the sight. In his cross-hairs is the commander's truck with its machine gun operator. Sarah and School Boy are on a hill overlooking the harbor. Soldiers kick and stomp on the mercenaries and missionaries, who cover their heads with their hands. Some of the troops use the butts of their rifles to inflict blows. The commander supervises. The commander beats them with a stick. The commander whips them with his stick. Reese's lips move, as if in silent prayer. The commander jabs his stick into Lewis' shredded leg. The group are dragged to their knees and lined up in front of the troops, who raise their rifles execution-style. Michael stares hopelessly ahead. From above, Sarah and School Boy look distraught. The troops take aim. The group have their hands on their heads. En-Joo spits on the ground. The gunner on the Jeep watches intently, not seeing Rambo rise behind him. Rambo cuts off his head with a machete. He shoots the Jeep driver with the machine gun. He turns the gun around on its turntable and begins picking off the Burmese troops. From his vantage point, School Boy lines off troops in his sights. A single shot from School Boy rips through two soldiers in tandem. Sarah covers her ears and shots arise. The remains of the Jeep driver tumble off the vehicle. A group of soldiers are cut in two. A soldier's leg is severed at the knee, and he falls over. En-Joo finds a weapon and starts shooting. Lewis grabs a soldier by the leg and pulls him over, head-butts him unconscious, and spits on him contemptuously. Reese pulls a knife from his boot and stabs a trooper. Lewis finds a weapon and dishes out mayhem of his own.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: The cloth with the twine wrapped around it is seen by him. The cloth is picked up by him, revealing the triggered bomb mechanism beneath. The Tall Boy Missile is ignited by the claymore, erupting into a mushroom cloud of smoke and flame. Trees and shrubs are torn through by the blast, and a concentric wave of destruction is spread out from its epicenter, throwing up dirt and leaves and knocking over soldiers. Sarah and School Boy watch as the tall boat captain notes the grey smoke from the explosion on land and signals with his hand from the river. Off moves the boat. Running is continued by Sarah and School Boy. Along the river zips the patrol boat. Down a leafy path run Sarah and School Boy. She is motioned to stop by him. They crouch. His rifle is rested on a tree by him, and the site is used as a telescope. She looks. Soldiers kick and beat the escapees. The rifle is lifted off the tree by School Boy, and the area is searched using the sight. In his cross-hairs is the commander's truck with its machine gun operator. Overlooking the harbor are Sarah and School Boy on a hill. Mercenaries and missionaries are kicked and stomped on by soldiers, who cover their heads with their hands. Blows are inflicted by some of the troops using the butts of their rifles. Supervision is provided by the commander. A stick is used by the commander to beat them. A stick is used by the commander to whip them. Silent prayer seems to be mouthed by Reese. The commander's stick is jabbed into Lewis' shredded leg. To their knees, the group are dragged and lined up in front of the troops, who raise their rifles execution-style. Michael hopelessly stares ahead. From above, Sarah and School Boy appear distraught. Aim is taken by the troops. Hands are placed on their heads by the group. On the ground is spat by En-Joo. Intently watches the gunner on the Jeep, not seeing Rambo rise behind him. The head of the gunner is cut off by Rambo with a machete. The Jeep driver is shot by him with the machine gun. The gun is turned around by him on its turntable, and the Burmese troops begin to be picked off. From his vantage point, School Boy lines off troops in his sights. Through two soldiers in tandem, a single shot from School Boy rips. Sarah covers her ears, and shots arise. The Jeep driver's remains tumble off the vehicle. In two, a group of soldiers are cut. At the knee, a soldier's leg is severed, and he falls over. A weapon is found by En-Joo, and shooting is started by him. A soldier is grabbed by Lewis by the leg, pulled over, head-butted unconscious, and spat on contemptuously. A knife is pulled from his boot by Reese, and a trooper is stabbed. A weapon is found by Lewis, and mayhem of his own is dished out.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: He sees the cloth with twine wrapped around it and picks it up, revealing a triggered bomb mechanism. The claymore ignites the Tall Boy Missile, creating a mushroom cloud of smoke and flame. The blast tears through trees and shrubs, spreading destruction and knocking over soldiers. Sarah and School Boy watch. From the river, the tall boat captain sees the grey smoke and signals the boat to move. Sarah and School Boy keep running down a leafy path. He motions her to stop, crouches, and uses his rifle as a telescope. She looks. Escapees are kicked and beaten by soldiers. School Boy lifts his rifle and targets the commander's truck with its machine gun operator. Sarah and School Boy overlook the harbor. Soldiers beat the mercenaries and missionaries, who cover their heads. The commander supervises, beating them with a stick. Reese silently prays. The commander jabs Lewis' shredded leg. The group is dragged to their knees, lined up, and the troops raise their rifles execution-style. Michael stares hopelessly. Sarah and School Boy look distraught. The troops aim. En-Joo spits. The gunner on the Jeep doesn't see Rambo rise behind him. Rambo decapitates him with a machete, shoots the Jeep driver, and turns the gun on the Burmese troops. School Boy lines up troops in his sights. A single shot from him hits two soldiers. Sarah covers her ears as shots arise. The Jeep driver's remains tumble off. Soldiers are cut in two. A soldier's leg is severed, and he falls. En-Joo finds a weapon and shoots. Lewis grabs a soldier, head-butts him unconscious, and spits on him. Reese stabs a trooper with a knife. Lewis finds a weapon and causes mayhem.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: He sees the cloth with twine and picks it up, revealing a bomb mechanism. The claymore ignites the Tall Boy Missile, creating a mushroom cloud of smoke and flame. The blast destroys trees, spreads debris, and knocks over soldiers. Sarah and School Boy watch. The boat captain sees the smoke and signals to move. Sarah and School Boy run down a path, stop, and crouch. He uses his rifle as a telescope. They see escapees beaten by soldiers. School Boy targets the commander's truck. On a hill, they watch soldiers beat mercenaries and missionaries. The commander uses a stick to inflict pain. The group is lined up for execution. Michael looks hopeless. Sarah and School Boy are distraught. Troops aim. En-Joo spits. Rambo decapitates the gunner and shoots the Jeep driver, then targets Burmese troops. School Boy shoots two soldiers. Sarah covers her ears. The Jeep driver falls. Soldiers are cut down. A soldier's leg is severed. En-Joo and Lewis fight back. Reese stabs a trooper. Lewis finds a weapon and causes chaos.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: He observes the piece of cloth with the twine carefully wrapped around it. With a sense of curiosity and caution, he picks up the cloth, uncovering the bomb mechanism that has been triggered beneath it. The claymore device ignites the Tall Boy Missile, which erupts dramatically into a massive mushroom cloud composed of thick smoke and intense flames. The powerful blast forcefully tears through the surrounding trees and shrubs, spreading outward like a concentric wave of destruction from its epicenter. This violent explosion throws up dirt and leaves into the air and knocks over soldiers in its path. Sarah and School Boy watch the scene unfold. From the river, the tall boat captain notices the ominous grey smoke rising from the explosion on land and signals with his hand to his crew. The boat begins to move away. Meanwhile, Sarah and School Boy continue running with urgency. The patrol boat zips swiftly along the river. Sarah and School Boy make their way down a leafy path. He gestures for her to stop. They crouch down cautiously. He rests his rifle on a nearby tree and uses the sight as a makeshift telescope. She peers through it as well. They see the escapees being brutally kicked and beaten by soldiers. School Boy lifts his rifle off the tree and scans the area using the sight. In his cross-hairs is the commander's truck, complete with its machine gun operator. Sarah and School Boy find themselves on a hill that overlooks the harbor. Below, soldiers are kicking and stomping on the mercenaries and missionaries, who desperately cover their heads with their hands for protection. Some of the troops use the butts of their rifles to deliver harsh blows. The commander oversees the scene, beating them with a stick. The commander mercilessly whips them with his stick. Reese's lips move silently, as if in prayer. The commander jabs his stick into Lewis' already shredded leg. The group is forcibly dragged to their knees and lined up in front of the troops, who raise their rifles in an execution-style stance. Michael stares hopelessly ahead, resigned to his fate. From their vantage point above, Sarah and School Boy look on, distraught and helpless. The troops take aim. The group has their hands placed on their heads in surrender. En-Joo defiantly spits on the ground. The gunner on the Jeep watches the scene intently, unaware of Rambo rising stealthily behind him. Rambo swiftly cuts off his head with a machete. He then shoots the Jeep driver with the machine gun. Turning the gun around on its turntable, he begins picking off the Burmese troops with precision. From his elevated position, School Boy lines up the troops in his sights. A single, well-aimed shot from School Boy rips through two soldiers simultaneously. Sarah covers her ears as the sound of gunfire erupts. The remains of the Jeep driver tumble off the vehicle. A group of soldiers is cut in two by the relentless gunfire. A soldier's leg is severed at the knee, causing him to fall over. En-Joo finds a weapon and starts shooting with determination. Lewis grabs a soldier by the leg, pulls him over, head-butts him into unconsciousness, and spits on him with contempt. Reese pulls a knife from his boot and stabs a trooper with precision. Lewis finds a weapon and unleashes mayhem of his own, adding to the chaos.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: He attentively observes the piece of cloth, which has been meticulously wrapped with twine in a careful manner. With a mix of curiosity and caution, he delicately picks up the cloth, revealing the bomb mechanism that has been set off and lies hidden beneath it. The claymore device promptly ignites the Tall Boy Missile, which erupts in a dramatic and explosive manner, creating a massive mushroom cloud composed of dense, thick smoke and intense, fiery flames. The tremendous, powerful blast forcefully rips through the nearby trees and shrubs, spreading outward in a destructive concentric wave from its epicenter. This violent and thunderous explosion hurls dirt and leaves up into the air, knocking over soldiers in its destructive wake. Sarah and School Boy stand by, watching the scene unfold with great intensity. From the river, the tall boat captain notices the ominous grey smoke billowing from the explosion on land and gestures with his hand to signal his crew. The boat promptly begins to move away from the danger. Meanwhile, Sarah and School Boy carry on with a sense of urgency, running swiftly. The patrol boat zips quickly along the river. Sarah and School Boy make their way stealthily down a leafy path. He signals for her to stop with a gesture of his hand. They crouch down cautiously, taking cover. He rests his rifle on a nearby tree and uses the sight as an impromptu makeshift telescope. She peers through it as well, sharing the view. Together, they witness the escapees being brutally kicked and beaten by soldiers. School Boy carefully lifts his rifle off the tree and surveys the area using the sight. In his cross-hairs is the commander's truck, complete with its machine gun operator ready for action. Sarah and School Boy find themselves on a hill that provides a clear overlook of the harbor below. Below, soldiers are seen kicking and stomping on the mercenaries and missionaries, who are desperately covering their heads with their hands for protection. Some of the troops are using the butts of their rifles to deliver harsh and unforgiving blows. The commander oversees the scene, mercilessly beating them with a stick. The commander persistently whips them with his stick, showing no mercy. Reese, with his lips moving silently, appears to be in prayer. The commander jabs his stick into Lewis' already shredded and wounded leg. The group is forcibly dragged to their knees and lined up in front of the troops, who raise their rifles in an execution-style stance, ready to fire. Michael stares ahead with a sense of hopeless resignation to his fate. From their vantage point above, Sarah and School Boy watch, feeling distraught and helpless in the situation. The troops take aim, preparing to fire. The group has their hands placed on their heads in a gesture of surrender. En-Joo defiantly spits on the ground, showing his resistance. The gunner on the Jeep watches the unfolding scene with intense focus, completely unaware of Rambo stealthily rising behind him. In one swift motion, Rambo cuts off his head with a machete. He then swiftly shoots the Jeep driver using the machine gun. Turning the gun around on its turntable, he begins picking off the Burmese troops with precise accuracy. From his elevated position, School Boy lines up the troops in his sights. A single, well-aimed shot from School Boy tears through two soldiers simultaneously. Sarah covers her ears to block out the sound as gunfire erupts around them. The lifeless remains of the Jeep driver tumble off the vehicle. A group of soldiers is violently cut in two by the relentless gunfire. A soldier's leg is severed at the knee, causing him to fall over in pain. En-Joo finds a weapon and starts shooting with fierce determination. Lewis grabs a soldier by the leg, pulls him over, head-butts him into unconsciousness, and spits on him with utter contempt. Reese, acting quickly, pulls a knife from his boot and stabs a trooper with precise accuracy. Lewis finds another weapon and unleashes mayhem of his own, adding to the swirling chaos around him.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: He notices the cloth with the twine wrapped around it, and with a cautious movement, he reaches out to pick up the cloth, uncovering the bomb mechanism that has been triggered beneath it. As the claymore ignites, it sets off the Tall Boy Missile, which erupts violently into a towering mushroom cloud of smoke and flame. The force of the blast tears through the surrounding trees and shrubs, spreading outwards in a concentric wave of destruction from its epicenter, hurling dirt and leaves into the air and knocking over soldiers caught in its path. Sarah and School Boy stand by, watching the unfolding chaos. Meanwhile, from the river, the tall boat captain observes the grey smoke billowing from the explosion on land and, with a decisive gesture of his hand, signals for the boat to move off. As the boat zips along the river, Sarah and School Boy continue their desperate run down a leafy path. He motions for her to stop, and they both crouch down. He carefully rests his rifle on a tree, using the sight as a makeshift telescope to survey the scene. She peers through the sight as well, witnessing the escapees being brutally kicked and beaten by soldiers. School Boy then lifts his rifle off the tree and scans the area through the sight, focusing on the commander's truck with its machine gun operator. Positioned on a hill overlooking the harbor, Sarah and School Boy watch as soldiers mercilessly kick and stomp on the mercenaries and missionaries, who can do nothing but cover their heads with their hands. Some of the troops use the butts of their rifles to deliver punishing blows, while the commander oversees the brutality. The commander takes it further, beating them with a stick and then whipping them with it. Reese's lips move silently, as if in prayer, while the commander cruelly jabs his stick into Lewis' already shredded leg. The group is forcibly dragged to their knees and lined up in front of the troops, who raise their rifles in an execution-style stance. Michael stares ahead, hopelessness etched on his face. From their vantage point above, Sarah and School Boy look on, distraught. The troops take aim, and the group, with their hands on their heads, brace for the worst. En-Joo defiantly spits on the ground. The gunner on the Jeep watches the scene intently, oblivious to Rambo rising silently behind him. In a swift, lethal motion, Rambo decapitates him with a machete, then seizes the machine gun to shoot the Jeep driver. He swiftly turns the gun around on its turntable and begins to systematically pick off the Burmese troops. From his elevated position, School Boy lines up the troops in his sights, and with a single, precise shot, he takes down two soldiers in tandem. Sarah covers her ears as the sound of gunfire erupts around them. The remains of the Jeep driver tumble lifelessly off the vehicle. A group of soldiers is brutally cut in two, while another soldier's leg is severed at the knee, causing him to collapse. En-Joo seizes a weapon and starts firing back. Lewis, in a burst of defiance, grabs a soldier by the leg, pulls him over, and head-butts him into unconsciousness before spitting on him with contempt. Reese, not to be outdone, pulls a knife from his boot and stabs a trooper. Lewis finds a weapon and unleashes his own brand of mayhem, adding to the chaos of the battle.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: He discovers the cloth with twine and uncovers a triggered bomb mechanism beneath it. The claymore ignites the Tall Boy Missile, creating a mushroom cloud of smoke and flame that devastates the surrounding area, knocking over soldiers. Observing from the river, the tall boat captain signals and the boat departs. Meanwhile, Sarah and School Boy run down a leafy path, stopping to crouch as he uses his rifle sight to observe soldiers beating escapees. School Boy spots the commander's truck with its machine gun operator. On a hill overlooking the harbor, they witness soldiers brutalizing mercenaries and missionaries, who are lined up for execution. The commander beats them with a stick, and Reese silently prays. As the troops prepare to fire, Rambo stealthily approaches, decapitates the gunner, and uses the machine gun to attack the Burmese troops. School Boy assists by shooting two soldiers with a single shot, while Sarah covers her ears from the gunfire. En-Joo and Lewis join the fray, with En-Joo firing a weapon and Lewis subduing a soldier with a head-butt. Reese stabs a trooper, and Lewis finds a weapon to continue the fight.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: He sees the cloth with the twine wrapped around it, a makeshift bundle commonly used in guerrilla warfare to disguise traps. He picks up the cloth, revealing the triggered bomb mechanism beneath that has been deliberately concealed to catch adversaries by surprise. The claymore, an anti-personnel mine invented during the Korean War, ignites the Tall Boy Missile, a large bomb originally designed during World War II, which erupts into a mushroom cloud of smoke and flame. The blast tears through trees and shrubs in the dense jungle terrain of Southeast Asia, spreading out like a concentric wave of destruction from its epicenter, throwing up dirt and leaves and knocking over soldiers engaged in the ruthless conflict. Sarah and School Boy watch anxiously as chaos unfolds. From the river, the tall boat captain, skilled in navigating these treacherous waters, notes the grey smoke from the explosion on land and signals with his hand, a pre-arranged signal among his crew. The boat, a traditional long-tail boat used for quick escapes, moves off swiftly. Sarah and School Boy keep running, driven by the urgency of their mission. The patrol boat, part of a larger fleet tasked with controlling the river, zips along the river. Sarah and School Boy run down a leafy path, typical of the dense South Asian forest. He motions her to stop at a strategic point. They crouch. He rests his rifle on a tree and uses the sight as a telescope. She looks, her heart pounding. The escapees, likely targeting a safe zone, are being kicked and beaten by soldiers notorious for their brutality. School Boy lifts his rifle off the tree and searches the area using the sight, honed by years of military experience. In his cross-hairs is the commander's truck, an armored vehicle with its machine gun operator poised for violence. Sarah and School Boy are on a hill overlooking the harbor, a strategic vantage point. Soldiers kick and stomp on the mercenaries and missionaries, who cover their heads with their hands in a futile attempt to shield themselves. Some of the troops use the butts of their rifles to inflict blows, a common tactic to instill fear. The commander supervises, a feared leader with a reputation for cruelty. The commander beats them with a stick, asserting dominance. The commander whips them with his stick, a traditional symbol of authority and punishment. Reese's lips move, as if in silent prayer for deliverance from this ordeal. The commander jabs his stick into Lewis' shredded leg, a wound borne from previous skirmishes. The group are dragged to their knees and lined up in front of the troops, who raise their rifles execution-style, reminiscent of countless war atrocities. Michael stares hopelessly ahead, accepting his fate. From above, Sarah and School Boy look distraught, unable to intervene. The troops take aim, their actions a grim reminder of the conflict's reality. The group have their hands on their heads, a gesture of surrender. En-Joo spits on the ground, a sign of defiance. The gunner on the Jeep watches intently, not seeing Rambo rise behind him, the legendary warrior known for his stealth and combat prowess. Rambo cuts off his head with a machete, a swift and silent method of eliminating the enemy. He shoots the Jeep driver with the machine gun, seizing the vehicle. He turns the gun around on its turntable and begins picking off the Burmese troops, turning the tide of battle. From his vantage point, School Boy lines off troops in his sights, a testament to his marksmanship. A single shot from School Boy rips through two soldiers in tandem, showcasing deadly precision. Sarah covers her ears and shots arise, the sound echoing through the forest. The remains of the Jeep driver tumble off the vehicle, a casualty of the intense skirmish. A group of soldiers are cut in two by the hail of bullets. A soldier's leg is severed at the knee, and he falls over in agony. En-Joo finds a weapon and starts shooting, joining the fray. Lewis grabs a soldier by the leg and pulls him over, head-butts him unconscious, showcasing his combat skills, and spits on him contemptuously. Reese pulls a knife from his boot, a hidden weapon of last resort, and stabs a trooper. Lewis finds a weapon and dishes out mayhem of his own, driven by survival instincts.

test_cases.name: Addition (~50%)
test_cases.description: He sees the cloth with the twine wrapped around it. He picks up the cloth revealing the triggered bomb mechanism beneath. The claymore ignites the Tall Boy Missile which erupts into a mushroom cloud of smoke and flame. The blast tears through trees and shrubs and spreads out like a concentric wave of destruction from its epicenter throwing up dirt and leaves and knocking over soldiers. Sarah and School Boy watch. From the river the tall boat captain notes the grey smoke from the explosion on land and signals with his hand. The boat moves off. Sarah and School Boy keep running. The patrol boat zips along the river. Sarah and School Boy run down a leafy path. He motions her to stop. They crouch. He rests his rifle on a tree and uses the site as a telescope. She looks. The escapees are being kicked and beaten by soldiers. School Boy lifts his rifle off the tree and searches the area using the sight. In his crosshairs is the commander's truck with its machine gun. operator. Sarah and School Boy are on a hill overlooking the harbor. Soldiers kick and stomp on the mercenaries and missionaries who cover their heads with their hands. Some of the troops use the butts of their rifles to inflict blows. The commander supervises. The commander beats them with a stick. The commander whips them with his stick. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. Reese's lips move as if in silent prayer. The commander jabs his stick into Lewis' shredded leg. The group are dragged to their knees and lined up in front of the troops who raise their rifles. executionstyle. Michael stares hopelessly ahead. From above. Sarah and School Boy look distraught. The troops take aim. The group have their hands on their heads. EnJoo spits on the ground. The gunner on the Jeep watches intently not seeing Rambo rise behind him. Rambo cuts off his head with a machete. He shoots the Jeep driver with the machine gun. He turns the gun around on its turntable and begins picking off the Burmese troops. From his vantage point. School Boy lines off troops in his sights. A single shot from School Boy rips through two soldiers in tandem. Sarah covers her ears and shots arise. The remains of the Jeep driver tumble off the vehicle. A group of soldiers are cut in two. A soldier's leg is severed at the knee and he falls over. EnJoo finds a weapon and starts shooting. Lewis grabs a soldier by the leg and pulls him over headbutts him unconscious and spits on him contemptuously. Reese pulls a knife from his boot and stabs a trooper. Lewis finds a weapon and dishes out mayhem of his own.

The patrol boat zips along the river. Sarah and School Boy run down a leafy path. He motions her to stop. They crouch. He rests his rifle on a tree and uses the site as a telescope. She looks. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. The blast sweeps through trees and shrubs and fans out like a circular wave of havoc from its center, kicking up dirt and leaves and toppling soldiers. Sarah and School Boy watch. From the river, the tall boat captain observes the grey smoke from the explosion on land and waves with his hand. The boat drifts away. Sarah and School Boy keep strolling. The patrol boat sails along the river. Sarah and School Boy tread down a leafy path. He signals her to rest. They stand. He balances his rifle on a tree and uses the sight as a magnifying glass. She glances. The escapees are being nudged and poked by soldiers. School Boy lifts his rifle off the tree and scans the area using the sight. In his cross-hairs is the commander's truck with its machine gun operator. Sarah and School Boy are on a hill overlooking the harbor. Soldiers nudge and nudge the mercenaries and missionaries, who shield their heads with their hands. Some of the troops use the butts of their rifles to deliver taps. The commander directs. The group are pulled to their knees and lined up in front of the troops, who lower their rifles to the ground. Michael gazes hopelessly ahead. From above, Sarah and School Boy look concerned. The troops glance away. The group have their hands on their heads. En-Joo spits on the ground. The gunner on the Jeep watches closely, not noticing Rambo rising behind him. Rambo taps him on the shoulder with a machete. He waves at the Jeep driver with the machine gun. He spins the gun around on its turntable and begins tapping at the Burmese troops. From his vantage point, School Boy lines off troops in his sights. A single shot from School Boy whispers through two soldiers in tandem. Sarah covers her ears and whispers arise. The remains of the Jeep driver slip off the vehicle. A group of soldiers are tapped on the shoulder. A soldier's leg is nudged at the knee, and he trips over. En-Joo finds a weapon and starts tossing it. Lewis grabs a soldier by the leg and pulls him over, pats him on the back, and smiles at him contemptuously. Reese pulls a knife from his boot and pokes a trooper. Lewis finds a weapon and delivers peace of his own.

The blast tears through tents and lanterns and spreads out like a concentric wave of transformation from its epicenter, throwing up sand and petals and knocking over dolphins. Violet and Backpack Kid watch. From the pond, the short train conductor notes the pink confetti from the explosion on stage and signals with his elbow. The train moves off. Mario cuts off his shoulder with a scythe. He shoots the scooter driver with the saxophone. He turns the saxophone around on its mount and begins picking off the Swedish dancers. From his overlook, Backpack Kid lines off dancers in his cross-hairs. A single shot from Backpack Kid rips through two dolphins in unison. Violet covers her eyes and melodies arise. The remains of the scooter driver tumble off the vehicle. A trio of dolphins are split in two. A dolphin's fin is severed at the base, and it falls over. Cho finds a saxophone and starts drumming. test_cases.name: Subject-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: She notices the blanket with the string coiled around it. She grabs the blanket, uncovering the deactivated alarm system underneath. The lantern lights up the Giant Kite Bomb, which bursts into a cloud of feathers and confetti. The noise disrupts birds and squirrels and ripples out like a spiral wave of confusion from its core, tossing up petals and twigs and startling hikers. Oliver and Bookworm observe. From the lake, the short raft pilot observes the white mist from the eruption on land and gestures with his head. The raft drifts away. Oliver and Bookworm keep swimming. The cargo raft glides along the estuary. Oliver and Bookworm paddling down a watery trail. She signals him to pause. They huddle. She places her camera on a bush and uses the lens as binoculars. He watches. The hikers are being pushed and tripped by rangers. Bookworm pulls his camera off the bush and surveys the vicinity using the viewfinder. In her focus is the leader's van with its spotlight operator. Oliver and Bookworm are on a cliff overlooking the pier. Rangers shove and nudge the adventurers and tourists, who shield their faces with their arms. Some of the guards use the ends of their flashlights to administer shoves. The leader oversees. The leader nudges them with a branch. The leader taps them with his branch. Carlos' mouth twitches, as if in silent conversation. The leader pokes his branch into Jordan's bruised arm. The team are lifted to their feet and arranged in front of the guards, who raise their flashlights inspection-style. Meredith gazes blankly ahead. From a distance, Oliver and Bookworm appear anxious. The guards focus their lights. The team have their palms on their cheeks. Anderson grumbles on the ground. The spotlight operator on the van watches closely, not noticing Taylor ascend behind him. Taylor grabs his scarf with a dagger. He hits the van driver with the spotlight. He swivels the light around on its axis and starts illuminating the marching guards. From her lookout, Bookworm aligns guards in her viewfinder. A single click from Bookworm captures two hikers in succession. Oliver covers his face, and screams emerge. The remains of the van driver roll off the road. A team of guards is illuminated brilliantly. A guard’s foot is illuminated, and he slips down. Anderson discovers a flashlight and begins illuminating. Jordan grapples a guard by the arm and flips him over, boops him senseless, and grumbles at him disdainfully. Carlos draws a pen from his pocket and pokes a ranger. Jordan discovers a flashlight and wreaks havoc of his own.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: He discovers a bomb mechanism beneath a cloth, triggering an explosion that devastates the area. Sarah, School Boy, and others witness the chaos. As they flee along a path, School Boy spots enemies through his rifle sight. They see soldiers abusing prisoners, including a commander harshly supervising the ordeal. As the prisoners face execution, Rambo emerges, decapitating a gunner and firing on the troops. School Boy uses his rifle to aid the attack, while Sarah covers her ears against the gunfire. Amidst the turmoil, En-Joo seizes a weapon, and Lewis and Reese fight back, creating further chaos.
